title: FIT File: Zwift Price Hike, New Strava Features, and Des Goes to Band Camp
content:
﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿

For those not subscribed to the FIT File (it’s free!) via your regular podcast app or on YouTube, here’s a quick post with the highlights from the most recent episode.

In this episode, we talk about the Zwift price increase, the Saga HoloBike, SRAM’s new RED AXS groupset, and much more.

0:00 Intro
1:28 Saga HoloBike
14:40 Strava Band Camp
19:17 New Strava Features
39:13 Hammerhead Karoo 3
52:20 New SRAM Red AXS Groupset
59:36 Zwift Price Increase

Thanks to Precision Fuel & Hydration, where you can get 15% off your first order.  Additionally, check out their free Fuel & Hydration Planner.

As a reminder, here’s where you can find the podcast:

  • The FIT File on YouTube.

And then for the audio-only version, you can find it here:

  • Apple Podcasts
  • YouTube Music
  • Spotify
  • RSS Feed

Thanks for listening!
author: DC Rainmaker
